title: MediCare (MERN)
description: MediCare is a full-stack medical camp management system built with the MERN stack, where users can explore, register for, and manage medical camps efficiently.

title: BookCove (MERN)
description: BookCove is a full-stack library management application built with the MERN stack, where users can browse, borrow, and return books, track borrowed history, and manage their reading journey efficiently.

title: Equi-sports (MERN)
description: Equi-sports is a MERN stack-based inventory management website for sports equipment. Users can browse products, place orders, and manage stock levels while maintaining minimum quantity alerts for efficient restocking.

title: careerpath-pro
description: A career counseling platform providing personalized guidance, resume reviews, and counseling sessions. Built with React, React Router, and Firebase.

title: Gadget-Heavens
description: Gadget-Heavens is an inventory management website for electronic gadgets. Users can browse products, place orders, and efficiently manage stock levels, with minimum quantity alerts to help with restocking and smooth inventory control.

title: BPL-CRICKET-DREAM
description: Welcome to BPL-CRICKET-DREAM, an interactive web application where users can select and manage cricket players for their dream team. Inspired by fantasy leagues, this project allows users to simulate player selection under coin-based limitations and enjoy a beautiful, responsive UI design.
